song.title: Jesus, we adore you, Lord
song.lyrics:
[C] Jesus, we adore you, Lord, Jesus, we adore you, Lord, Jesus, we adore you, Lord, We adore you.
[V1] For life has made itself known. In the dark of our sin, light has shown, The Son of God, given for us We come to worship and adore.
[V2] Jesus, true God and true man. You became one of us, Maryâ€™s child. Emmanuel, God-is-with-us, You make your dwelling in our midst.
[V3] Jesus, the Lamb who was slain, Let us gaze on your heart, pierced for us. Spirit of God flows from the cross, Water of life that makes us whole.
[V4] Jesus, from out of the tomb, You have overcome death, God of life! Body of Christ, broken for us, We come to worship and adore.
